name: Bert Question and Answerer
description: Answers questions based on the content of a given passage. To integrate the model into your app, try the `BertQuestionAnswerer` API in the TensorFlow Lite Task library. `BertQuestionAnswerer` takes a passage string and a query string, and returns the answer strings. It encapsulates the processing logic of inputs and outputs and runs the inference with the best practice.

input_tensor_metadata.name: mask
input_tensor_metadata.description: Mask with 1 for real tokens and 0 for padding tokens.

input_tensor_metadata.name: segment_ids
input_tensor_metadata.description: 0 for the first sequence, 1 for the second sequence if exists.

output_tensor_metadata.name: end_logits
output_tensor_metadata.description: logits over the sequence which indicates the end position of the answer span with closed interval.

output_tensor_metadata.name: start_logits
output_tensor_metadata.description: logits over the sequence which indicates the start position of the answer span with closed interval.

author: TensorFlow Lite Model Maker
